name: Fragile and conflict affected situations
special_notes: Fragile and conflict-affected situations aggregate as of FY25 (July 1, 2024-June 30, 2025). Countries are distinguished based on the nature and severity of issues they face and classified into two categories: (i) Countries with significant institutional and social fragility, determined by indicators of policy quality and fragility. (ii) Countries experiencing violent conflict, classified by conflict-related deaths per capita and further divided into high-intensity and medium-intensity conflict subcategories. For more information, please visit https://www.worldbank.org/en/topic/fragilityconflictviolence/brief/classification-of-fragile-and-conflict-affected-situations.
